text: The International Franchise Association is a trade association for the franchise industry. It was started in Chicago in 1961. It campaigns for its members and has been involved in Supreme court cases in the USA. In 2020 it said it had a membership of 1,400 brands, and that its members represent 2.5% of the United States GDP. ==References== Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:Organizations based in Illinois Category:Trade associations
title: International Franchise Association
